text: The Kosovar Superliga is the name of the handball league of Kosovo. == Competition Format == The season begins with a regular season between the ten teams. The first six teams qualifies for a first play-off round, while the last four plays a play-down round. At the end of this second round, the first four teams plays elimination rounds. == 2018/19 Season participants== The following 10 clubs compete in the Superliga during the 2018–19 season. {|
